New_Haven.Highville Mustard Seed Charter School:
Highville Mustard Seed Charter School for International Studies is a charter school situated on Leeder Hill Drive, Hamden, Connecticut, USA. It was founded by Lyndon Pitter and opened in Fall 1998. Highville educates pupils from pre-kindergarten to Grade 8 with around 300 on the roll.
Highville is notable in that all teaching is carried out in an international context.
